wikipedia_page.main: M. Claire Cross  is a British historian and professor emeritus in history at the University of York. She was president of the Ecclesiastical History Society in 1989-90.

response: Claire Delacroix is one of the pseudonyms used by Deborah Cooke. She also writes under the name Claire Cross. Deborah has an honors degree in history. She has written more that forty novels. She is married and lives in Canada.
